TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi DispatcherFrame extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject

summary.span: 表示 中的例外狀況迴圈。

span.span: Represents an execution loop in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件通常分為兩類： objects typically fall into two categories: - 指示時，只能結束的長時間執行的一般用途框架。Long running, general purpose frames that exit only when instructed to. 要求時，這些框架應結束。These frames should exit when they are requested. - 很重要的條件符合時，短時間執行，非常特定框架會結束。Short running, very specific frames that exit when an important criteria is met. 考慮這些框架不可能會改為等候其結束準則符合要求時結束。These frames may consider not to exit when they are requested in favor of waiting for their exit criteria to be met. 這些畫面格應該有與其相關聯的逾時。These frames should have a time-out associated with them. ## XAML 文字用法XAML Text Usage 您無法使用這個 managed 的類別[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。You cannot use this managed class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用來達到類似的結果為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]方法。The following example shows how to use a to achieve similar results as the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] method. [!code-csharp[dispatchersnippets#DispatcherDispatcherFrameDoEvents](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DispatcherSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#dispatcherdispatcherframedoevents)] [!code-vb[dispatchersnippets#DispatcherDispatcherFrameDoEvents](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DispatcherSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#dispatcherdispatcherframedoevents)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool exitWhenRequested) cil managed

param.name: exitWhenRequested
param.span: 表示當要求所有框架結束時這個框架是否連同結束。

span.span: Indicates whether this frame will exit when all frames are requested to exit.

summary.span: 使用指定的結束要求旗標，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, by using the specified exit request flag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常分為兩類： typically fall into two categories: - 長時間執行的一般用途框架，指示時，只有已結束。Long running, general purpose frames, that exit only when instructed to. 要求時，這些框架應結束。These frames should exit when they are requested. - 很重要的條件符合時，短時間執行，非常特定框架會結束。Short running, very specific frames that exit when an important criteria is met. 這些框架可能會考慮改為等候其結束準則符合要求時不會結束。These frames may consider not exiting when they are requested in favor of waiting for their exit criteria to be met. 這些畫面格應該有與其相關聯的逾時。These frames should have a time-out associated with them. - - 在應用程式關閉所有框架都是要求結束。At application shutdown, all frames are request to exit.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Continue { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示這個 是否應繼續。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this should continue.

value.span: 如果框架應繼續則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the frame should continue; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會查詢每一個發送器迴圈的頂端。 is queried at the top of each dispatcher loop. 在應用程式關閉所有框架都是要求結束。At application shutdown, all frames are request to exit. ## XAML 文字用法XAML Text Usage 這個類別的成員不常使用中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，或不能用於在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Members of this class are either not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], or cannot be used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用來達到類似的結果為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]方法。The following example shows how to use a to achieve similar results as the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] method. [!code-csharp[dispatchersnippets#DispatcherDispatcherFrameDoEvents](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DispatcherSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#dispatcherdispatcherframedoevents)] [!code-vb[dispatchersnippets#DispatcherDispatcherFrameDoEvents](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DispatcherSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#dispatcherdispatcherframedoevents)]
